name: Disney's A Christmas Carol
description:
Ebenezer Scrooge is a mean old man. He never does good things to anyone - he simply refuses their demands with his favorite saying "Bah humbug". One Christmas day, siting in his office, Scrooge shows his mean character to anyone he meets as usual, even to his nephew and his clerk Bob Cratchit. His mean character does not seem to change until when he gets home, and meets his friend Jacob Marley's ghost, who tells him about the incoming arrival of some three spirits and warn him to change his ways...

Disney's a Chistmas Carol is a point-and-click adventure game based on the 2009 cartoon movie A Christmas Carol, which itself is also based on the novel with the same name by Charles Dickens. In this game, the player takes on the role of no characters. There is an objective in each scene, demanding players to interact with items to proceed. Players have the ability to manipulate things similar to Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective. Players can only interact with certain items, which can be shown by blowing into the microphone. The game features some mini games. Earning certain number of points will gives players a prize. There are three ranks that can be achieved: Bronze Star, Silver Star and Golden Star. Once a mini games is found, it will be stored in the MiniGames section; players can replay them anytime. There are also hidden secrets, like golden stars or ghosts. Obtaining these secrets may be helpful for players during the game.

The game's graphic are in isometric 2D. The total number of save slot is 3. Players' process is automatically saved.
